casebody.data:
No. 145,

Misc.

Bruno v. Herold, State Hospital Director. Gretchen White Oberman for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, Joel Lewittes, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
